rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Coalesce {4}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this for {4}{U}{U} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
